actions.description: The borthak makes one Bite attack or uses Noxious Regurgitation if available, and it makes two Stomp attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Stomp

actions.description: The borthak spews acid at a creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 24 (7d6) acid damage and has the poisoned condition until the start of the borthak's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.
actions.name: Noxious Regurgitation (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: The borthak moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
actions.name: Move

actions.description: The borthak makes one Bite attack.
actions.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)

specialTraits.description: At the end of the borthak's turn, slippery ice covers surfaces within 10 feet of the borthak. This ice is difficult terrain. When a creature other than the borthak enters the ice's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or have the prone condition. The ice disappears at the start of the borthak's next turn.
specialTraits.name: Glacial Aura

specialTraits.description: The borthak can move across icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.
specialTraits.name: Webbed Feet
